__e: First time you kill someone is never easy.
If you kill me, you'll only really be killing yourself.
If you kill her, the answers you've been looking for your entire life will die with her.
You kill a guy, next day almost get killed yourself.
You don't kill a guy you're trying to get money from.
I need you to kill a man.
That's how you kill a dog or cat or something, not a man.
This won't be the first time you've killed an innocent, but it will be the first time you have to watch.
But you kill us... another comes to take his place.
Mama says I can't live with you because you kill people.
You kill people, but I see something human in you.
You killed the woman I love, and there is no reason in this world that I shouldn't do the same to you.
You kill the kid, leave him to me.
I don't want to do it, but how am I gonna look, you kill my partner, I don't make a move?
The last memory I have is of you killing the best friend and teacher I ever had.
I guess when you kill somebody in this town, they give you his job.
When you kill people, you are hurting me, and you can not hurt me!
And it's not the first time you've killed someone by doing this, either.
Kill me and the little one inside me!
If you want to kill somebody, kill me, please.
